Uses of Package
org.cooperari.core

  • Packages that use org.cooperari.core 
    Package Description
    org.cooperari.core
    Cooperari engine.
    org.cooperari.core.aspectj
    Package for interface with the AspectJ compiler and LTW agent.
    org.cooperari.errors
    Cooperari error classes, related to aspects like runtime execution events (e.g., deadlock or race detection), invalid configuration options, internal errors, etc.
    org.cooperari.feature
    Root package for feature implementations.
    org.cooperari.feature.atomic
    Yields points for methods in java.util.concurrent.AtomicXXX classes.
    org.cooperari.feature.data
    Support for data access yield points and race detection.
    org.cooperari.feature.hotspots
    Hotspot reachability feature.
    org.cooperari.feature.monitor
    Yield point support for Java monitor operations and related deadlock detection.
    org.cooperari.feature.thread
    Yield point support Thread life-cycle methods.
    org.cooperari.feature.threadrunner
    Support for the "fork-and-join" thread runner.
    org.cooperari.feature.unsafe
    Support for yield points in calls to methods to sun.misc.Unsafe.
  • Classes in org.cooperari.core used by org.cooperari.core 
    Class and Description
    CBlockingOperationEvent
    An enumeration of common operation outcomes used by several primitives.
    CConfiguration
    Configuration object defined by annotations.
    CCoverageLog
    Coverage log.
    CEngine
    Cooperative execution engine.
    COperation
    Base class for cooperative operations.
    CRuntime
    Cooperari runtime.
    CThread
    Cooperative thread.
    CThreadState
    Cooperative thread state.
    CTrace.EventType
    Event types.
    CUncaughtExceptionHandler
    Handler for uncaught thread exceptions.
    CWorkspace
    Keeps a record of the Cooperari workspace directory and global configurations, and provides associated utility methods.
    CWorkspace.Option
    Workspace options.
